meanings.definition: A group of people sharing a common ancestry or culture.
meanings.sent1: The gens gathered for a traditional celebration of their ancestors.
meanings.sent2: My gens has a long history of storytelling and music.
meanings.sent3: The gens decided to have a potluck to honor their heritage.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, each gens of animals had its own unique call.
meanings.sent5: The gens wore matching colors to show their unity.

meanings.sent1: Our gens always comes together for holidays and special occasions.
meanings.sent2: The gens lived in harmony in their small village.
meanings.sent3: The gens had a friendly competition to see who could bake the best pie.
meanings.sent4: The gens protected each other like a shield against any harm.
meanings.sent5: The gens shared stories around the fire, creating lasting memories.

meanings.definition: A group of organisms sharing a common gene pool.
meanings.sent1: The gens of birds in the forest had similar feather colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the gens of fish in the river to understand their behavior.
meanings.sent3: The gens of plants in the garden seemed to be competing for sunlight.
meanings.sent4: In the lab, researchers observed how the gens of bacteria interacted.
meanings.sent5: The gens of insects worked together to build a nest.
